Draw and Guess is an online multiplayer game of drawing and guessing. One person draws a randomly selected word (or phrase) and the rest try to guess it. If you want to start a new game, press \"GENERATE QR CODE\" button. You can share the QR code with your friends and play together. \n\n If your friend shared with you a QR code, press \"SCAN QR CODE\" button to join him!
